    Gaurav Neupane

    Summary

    Experienced Python Developer withover 4 years of expertise in backend systems, cloud computing and artificial intelligence.Proficient in AWS, Docker, and PostgreSQL, with a proven track record of optimizing performance and delivering high-quality software solutions using agile development methodologies, particularly in the AIindustries. Strong communication skills,a team-oriented approach, and a passionate, quick learner who thrives in collaborative environments.

    Experience

    • Developed a background removal AI system using Python and Computer Vision.

    • Worked on a back-end system supporting 100M+ downloads for real-time gameplay features.
    • Optimized the back-end for the games using MongoDB aggregation pipelines and Redis implementation.
    • Optimized API to search products and vendors by 15% using Apache Solr.
